page.title: 15LIVING IN HOCKWORTHY
page.content: IN THE YEAR OF 1985 HOCKWORTHY HAD A CONCERT.THE PEOPLE WHO WERE PLAYING WERE CALLED THE STRING QUARTET.THERE WERE ALSO ALOT OF REFRESHMENTS.THE VILLAGE IS QUITE SMALL AND HAS ONLY ONE CHURCH.STAPLE CROSS HAS ONE PUB THAT SELLS BADGER BEER.THERE ARE'NT MANY HOUSES IN STAPLE CROSS.HOCKWORTHY ALSO HAS A VILLAGE GREEN.ON THE VILLAGE GREEN THERE IS A BIG HOUSE. THERE IS ONE FARM THAT IS IN THE ACTUAL VILLAGE.IN HOCKWORTHY THERE ARE QUITE ALOT OF HOUSES AND FARMS.BUT HOCKWORTHY IS A VERY NICE VILLAGE.
